text: François Villeroy de Galhau (born 24 February 1959) is a French civil servant and banker. He is the Governor of the Bank of France since 2015.http://www.elysee.fr: Nomination ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:French economists Category:French bankers Category:People from Strasbourg
title: François Villeroy de Galhau
